group.name: Plugin Commands: Stack Diagnostics
group.description: These commands give more information about the status of the status of the stack, such as routing tables, neighbor tables, and child tables.

command.description: Prints out general information about the state of the stack.
Prints out the entries in the stack's child table.
Prints out the entries in the stack's neighbor table.
Prints out the entries in the stack's route table.
